title: I need to make some adjustments to a Shopify theme
snippet:
4 task request [Please, better see attachment] 
	

1.  Tags styles

URL: example http://propuestae.com/collections/all
 Should be seen in all pages where tags are shown. 



NEED: Separate tags so user can see it is not a paragraph of text or provide a better style to these tags so they look like buttons (using the blue and yellow from the logo)



 
2. Link buttons to internal pages 
URL:NEED: http://propuestae.com/ 


 https://propuesta-e.myshopify.com/admin/pages/202969411
 https://propuesta-e.myshopify.com/admin/pages/202969411
  https://propuesta-e.myshopify.com/admin/pages/202969411



 
3. Remove Decimals in prices

URL: http://propuestae.com/ and all product list pages

NEED: Do not show decimals. 


 
4. Install Zendesk [help desk chat] free version

URL: http://propuestae.com/ and all pages that is recommended

NEED:  Copy the following script and insert it into the HTML source of your website code between the <head>.


<!--Start of Zendesk Chat Script-->

$.src="//v2.zopim.com/?4KB68gbgbxM37tMAw6uQROXCgZJlbzko";z.t=+new Date;$.
